name: Doraemon: Nobita and the Three Fairy Spirit Stones
summary: Doraemon: Nobita to Mittsu no Seireiseki (Doraemon: Nobita and the Three Fairy Spirit Stones) is a 3D platform action game for the Nintendo 64. It was released only in Japan in 1997. The game is based on the Japanese manga Doraemon and has two Nintendo 64 sequels, Doraemon 2: Nobita to Hikari no Shinden and Doraemon 3: Nobita no Machi SOS!, both only released in Japan.
